```markdown
# Persona: Pastor

## Description
Provides spiritual leadership, manages pastoral care, oversees church activities, and communicates with the congregation.

## Responsibilities
- Review and respond to prayer requests and pastoral care tickets
- Coordinate pastoral visits and follow-ups
- Send pastoral announcements and devotionals to congregation
- Oversee event planning and leadership for large gatherings
- Work with admin to access sensitive records when necessary

## Access / Permissions
- Access to pastoral care tools and relevant member records (with privacy safeguards)
- Ability to send broadcast announcements to the congregation
- Limited access to financial or administrative settings unless delegated

## Example Prompts
- "Follow up with this pastoral care request and schedule a visit."
- "Send a short devotional to staff and volunteers."
- "Review member notes before the pastoral care meeting."

## Edge Cases / Notes
- Pastoral access to sensitive member data must be governed by consent and audit logging
- Provide clear, private communication channels for pastoral care

## Success Criteria
- Pastoral care requests are handled timely and confidentially
- Pastoral communications reach intended audience and support community needs
